mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_PRE_BILL_MAIN (
group_id , hos_id , copy_code , bill_no , invoice_no , bill_date , ven_id , ven_no , pact_code ,
bill_money ,
state ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
audit_emp ,
audit_date ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{bill_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invoice_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , to_date(#{bill_date},'yyyy-MM-dd') , #{ven_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ven_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{bill_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{create_emp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
to_date(#{create_date},'yyyy-MM-dd') ,
#{audit_emp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{audit_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, bill_no, invoice_no, bill_date, ven_id, ven_no, pact_code, bill_money, state, create_emp, create_date, audit_emp, audit_date, note FROM ass_pre_bill_main WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bill_no = #{bill_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, bill_no, invoice_no, bill_date, ven_id, pact_code, bill_money, state, create_emp, create_date, audit_emp, audit_date, note FROM ASS_PRE_BILL_MAIN where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND bill_no = #{bill_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.bill_no as id,a.hos_id,a.copy_code,a.group_id,a.note,a.bill_no, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核'when a.state = 2 then '确认' else '' end state , s.user_name AUDIT_EMP, s.user_name CREATE_EMP, to_char(a.CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') CREATE_DATE, to_char(a.AUDIT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AUDIT_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BILL_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_MONEY,'FM999,999,990.00') bill_money,a.INVOICE_NO, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, c.sup_code ven_code, c.sup_name ven_name from ASS_PRE_BILL_MAIN a
left join ASS_BILL_MAIN b on b.group_id=a.group_id and b.hos_id=a.hos_id and b.COPY_CODE =a.COPY_CODE and b.BILL_NO = a.BILL_NO left join sys_user s on s.group_id=a.group_id and s.hos_id=a.hos_id and s.user_id=a.CREATE_EMP and s.IS_STOP = 0 left join sys_user s1 on s1.group_id=a.group_id and s1.hos_id=a.hos_id and s1.user_id=a.AUDIT_EMP and s1.IS_STOP = 0
left join hos_sup_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.ven_id = c.sup_id and c.is_stop = 0
where a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.bill_no in (${paraId})

select a.bill_no as id,a.hos_id,a.copy_code,a.group_id,a.note,a.bill_no, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '确认' else '' end state , s.user_name AUDIT_EMP, s.user_name CREATE_EMP, to_char(a.CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') CREATE_DATE, to_char(a.AUDIT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AUDIT_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BILL_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_MONEY,'FM999,999,990.00') bill_money,a.INVOICE_NO, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, c.sup_code ven_code, c.sup_name ven_name from ASS_PRE_BILL_MAIN a
left join ASS_BILL_MAIN b on b.group_id=a.group_id and b.hos_id=a.hos_id and b.COPY_CODE =a.COPY_CODE and b.BILL_NO = a.BILL_NO left join sys_user s on s.group_id=a.group_id and s.hos_id=a.hos_id and s.user_id=a.CREATE_EMP and s.IS_STOP = 0 left join sys_user s1 on s1.group_id=a.group_id and s1.hos_id=a.hos_id and s1.user_id=a.AUDIT_EMP and s1.IS_STOP = 0
left join hos_sup_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.ven_id = c.sup_id and c.is_stop = 0
where a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.bill_no = #{bill_no}
